sentences.en: A tribal shaman is also followed, searching for rare plants.
sentences.cn: 他们同样部落的巫医, 寻找一些罕见的植物.

sentences.en: All Shaman enchants have updated graphics.
sentences.cn: 所有的萨满附魔有新的视觉效果.

sentences.en: But shaman says: listen to your ancestors.
sentences.cn: 但是萨满说: 听从祖灵.

sentences.en: Can you not a warrior, shaman, or an Orc be?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不是战士, 巫师, 魔兽之类的 呢 ?

sentences.en: Confirms that Orc Shaman will sacrifice Goblins to regain mana.
sentences.cn: 兽人萨满可以献祭地精回复魔法值.

sentences.en: Furbolg Shaman: Thank you, Priestess. We will reward you when you return.
sentences.cn: 熊怪萨满: 太感动了, 祭司. 当完后我们一定会报答的.

sentences.en: Leaders are mostly shaman, line monogamy.
sentences.cn: 首领多为萨满, 行一夫一妻制.

sentences.en: Nature's Guardian: This ability can now trigger while the Shaman is sitting.
sentences.cn: 自然守护: 现在萨满坐着时也能正常触发效果了.

sentences.en: Shaman : Earthbind Totem will now immobilize all Rogues in the same zone.
sentences.cn: 萨满: 地缚图腾将对所有该地图内的盗贼起定身作用.

sentences.en: Shaman : Leg Bite - Damage over time effect will now stack with other allies.
sentences.cn: Shaman:LegBite,持续性伤害的效果将会与队友相加.

sentences.en: Shaman and Chieftain now found in Nomad encounters.
sentences.cn: 在大地图也可以遇到僧人和酋长了?

sentences.en: Tauren shaman often war stomp and then cast LHW.
sentences.cn: 但是,高耗蓝和低效果加成,使得这个手段变得不是那么明智.

sentences.en: The shaman sics sorcerers on the evil spirits.
sentences.cn: 巫师嗾使魔法师去攻击恶鬼.

sentences.en: Tip: Pagan Shaman can cast spells which speed their allies up.
sentences.cn: 提示: 异教萨满巫师能施放使他们的同伴速度提高的咒语.

sentences.en: You hear shaman's council Shaman says wait for sign.
sentences.cn: 你们都听到了萨满法师的预言了,萨满法师说要等待征兆.

words.tran_cn: 巫师；萨满教的道士；僧人

trans.tran_cn: 萨满教的道士（僧人、巫师）
trans.tran_en: a person in some tribes who is a religious leader and is believed to be able to talk to  spirits  and cure illnesses
